tool_description: The Power BI API offers the Microsoft Power BI news, learning resources, events, samples and other information.
title: Power BI Smartable

api_list.name: GetNews
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://power-bi-smartable.p.rapidapi.com/news/page/{page}/"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "power-bi-smartable.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
